Title: The coronavirus has thick spikes that seem to latch more easily onto human cells than other viruses, according - Business Insider India
Description: A new study from the University of Minnesota created a 3D model of the new coronavirus and found that it could bind far more efficiently to human cell receptors

Title: US govt reportedly using location data from mobile ads to track coronavirus spread - Business Today
Description: Not only the US but other governments, including that of India, are now tracking citizens to study the coronavirus spread.

Title: Coronavirus scare: COVID-19 infection can spread even after symptoms disappear - TheHealthSite
Description: In India 99 coronavirus patients have been cured of the disease and discharged. But are they totally cleared of the virus? May be not.

Title: Coronavirus: The four stages of a global pandemic - Pandemic - Economic Times
Description: Over the past few months, the world has been hit by a large scale viral outbreak - coronavirus - that causes covid-19. India has already reported over 950 cases of the virus, and as cases look like rising further, here are the stages of a pandemic and what th…

Title: As coronavirus makes goodbyes hard, fears of many more rise in US - India Today
Description: The coronavirus outbreak could kill 100,000 to 200,000 Americans, the US government's top infectious-disease expert warned on Sunday as family members described wrenching farewells through hospital windows with dying loved ones.

Title: Trump backs off plan to reopen businesses by mid-April amid coronavirus warnings - Reuters India
Description: President Donald Trump on Sunday extended his stay-at-home guidelines until the end of April, dropping a hotly criticized plan to get the economy up and running by mid-April after a top medical adviser said more than 100,000 Americans could die from the coron…
